---
Song: oru mAtram
Film: nALai
---
Notes: s r2 g2 m1 p d1 n3 S


oru mAtram urumAtram iru idhayaTHil inikkira thadumAtram
pp  dp g   gd p  p   pp  dp  g s    ss  s s  n. s rg r

nadaimAtram udai mAtram indha neruppukkuL eppadi neerOttam
p p  dp g   gd   p  p   p p   d p  g  s   s s s  n.srg r

nadandhu pOhum pAdhaiyil...  iraNdu pakkam poo maram

mazhaiyum veyilum kalandha pin vAnavillAi

mAridum ulagamE
mpd p   mp d p

pudhithAi thOndrum

Stanza 1:
nEtru varai vAnaTHaiyE nimirndhu pArTHa nEramillai
p  d  S n2  p d S   n2 p p   d   S  S   SRn2 n2n2

kaNgaL moodi pArTHAlum kanavugaL kaNdathillai
p  d   S  n2 p  dS n2  p d S S   SR n2 n2 n2

mutruppuLLi pakkaTHilE mugavari ondru varuhiradhE
G  G  R  G  R  p p  p  m p d R  S  S  S n n n nG

mooCHu kAtru moTHaTHilE arTHam indru purihiradhE
G  G   R  G  R p  p  p  mp dR  S  S  S n n n n

purihiradhE O...
S R n p p   mpdp mpdp mpdpSndp

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
bhoomiyilE yArum ingE thaniyAga pirappadhillai
vazhithadangaL varuhaiyilE payaNangaL kalappadhillai(?)
kattAndharaiyil indru oru kAladi suvadu therihiradhE
vetta veLiyil thirindha pinnE veettin arumai purihiradhE
purihiradhE O...
